Description: Gold finger-ring set with a nicolo seal engraved with Helios wearing a radiated crown and chlamys, holding a whip; before him is a burning altar; in the field are a crescent and a star.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (493)
Gem / Catalogue of Engraved Gems & Cameos, Greek, Etruscan & Roman in the British Museum (1657)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
